column6: Paint is bubbling in several areas.
Significant areas of bubbling under surface of the paint, including around some thru-hulls. Appears to be some kind of corrosive reaction, exact cause unknown. May be cause for concern.
Paint blistering and separation continues to spread. May be caused by oxidation in the cement.
Installed 2 “E” prop nuts on rudder pintles.

Replaced:
Prop nut size D ($35)
Mini divers dream ($30)
1.25” shaft collar anode ($20)

I need to acquire a second DD mini, and three more prop nut size Ds for rudder, plus a bar-style about 5.25” long with single hole in center for starboard side. Will return to replace these when acquired.

Rudder requires size E or F prop nut anodes
Starboard bar-style hull anode: stud spinning in hull, unable to remove nut, unable to replace anode.
Replaced starboard DD mini ($30)
Installed E prop nut on rudder pintle.
Will return to replace (2) prop nut E anodes
